summary.span: Windows フォーム コントロールと WPF コントロールの相互運用をサポートするクラスが含まれています。

span.span: Contains classes that support interoperation of Windows Forms and WPF controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 間の相互運用できるようにするクラスが名前空間に含まれています、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]と[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]テクノロジ。The namespace contains classes that enable interoperation between the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies. 使用するとクラスをホストできます[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]コントロール[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]ページ、および[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]内の要素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-ベースのアプリケーション。When you use classes, you can host [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controls on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] pages, and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based applications. 相互運用機能を実装する 2 つのキー クラスはとします。The two key classes that implement interoperation capabilities are and . 使用するクラスは、コントロールの実装によって異なります。Which class you use depends on your control implementation: - 使用して、クラスを使用する必要があります、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]の control 権限、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]ページ。Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] page. - 使用して、クラスの必要がありますを使用する場合、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]内の要素を[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-ベースのアプリケーション。Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application.
